channel.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed
channel.description: A daily digest of curated Latin American news.

item.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed - September 24, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
Milei’s Big Problem Is Beyond US Treasury’s Help — Bloomberg

Milei’s Big Problem Is Beyond US Treasury’s Help

Milei Is Counting on Trump to Bail Argentina Out of an Economic Mess — The Wall Street Journal

‘Donald Trump to the Rescue’, a leading Argentine columnist wrote of the U.S.’s support for Milei as he grapples with popular anger and market turmoil.

This Conquistador Changed History. Neglect Haunts His Tomb in Mexico — The New York Times

Hernán Cortés toppled the Aztecs, winning Mexico for Spain. His trash-strewn resting place reflects how the conquest is still fueling quarrels and testing ties with Spain.
